WorkItem.Description:
I made a setup project(vs2010,office2007) and build the setup file on windows 7.
It's no problem to install it on windows 7. But when I installed it on windows 8.
There is no com addin appeared in office addin list.
The ribbon is also not displayed.
I also changed x86 of the setup project to x64. It's the same result.
Does any who met this problem? How did you settled it?

By the way, I am using netoffice 3.5(.net framework).

Comments.Message: The function ComRegisterFunctionAttribute: RegisterFunction wasn't executed.
msi doesnt call the register/unregister methods. never!you have to set the reg keys in the setup project.see the deployment sample in the download section.
